data.description: The intention of PoC V2.0 Requirement Document (RD) is to define the requirements for the Push to Talk over Cellular services beyond those requirements created for PoC as developed in OMA [OMA PoC RD 1.0].  As stated in PoC V2.0 Work Item Document (WID), the following will be covered in this RD: 1. Interworking between PoC domains and non-PoC domains 2. Machine-to-user PoC Session 3. Automatic PoC Session initiated by outside applications 4. Seamless interaction between PoC and other enablers (e.g., instant messaging, VoIP) 5. Use of a variety of media formats to provide enhanced user experience within PoC (e.g., video)
